title: Annual Fundraiser Gala
subtitle: Saturday, March 15th • 6:00 PM
description: Join us for an evening of celebration and giving as we support families in need. Dinner, silent auction, and inspirational stories from our community.

title: Community Cleanup Day
subtitle: Saturday, April 20th • 9:00 AM
description: Gather with neighbors to beautify our community. We'll provide supplies and refreshments. All ages welcome—great for families and groups.

title: Financial Freedom Class
subtitle: Starting February 10th • 6 weeks
description: Learn budgeting, debt reduction, and financial planning in a supportive environment. Childcare provided. Registration required.

title: Volunteer Appreciation Dinner
subtitle: Friday, May 5th • 6:30 PM
description: A special evening to thank our dedicated volunteers. Enjoy dinner, awards, and stories of impact. By invitation for active volunteers.

title: Summer Food Drive Kickoff
subtitle: Saturday, June 1st • 10:00 AM
description: Help us kick off our summer food drive with a community gathering. Learn how to get involved, donate, or host a collection at your church or workplace.
